name: Accurate Segmentation
description:
Accurate Segmentation - is a logical game with physics, in which you have to make the green cube come into contact with the blue platform for exactly 2 seconds. When you click on some of the figures, they break up into smaller ones, and when they click on the small pieces, they disappear. The difficulty is that you have a limited amount of action that you need to deliver a cube to the platform. In the game you need to use smartness and logical thinking for the successful passage of all levels.



-Interesting gameplay

-Different levels

-Beautiful physics and minimalistic graphics

-Pleasant musical accompaniment
